segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that stool, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like she’s waiting for something wonderful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just getting worse, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR
